xmlfilecontent_test.comment: Ensure xpoweredBy is NOT set to true
Ensure 'error-page' exists with 'exception-type' of 'java.lang.Throwable'
Ensure 'error-page' exists with a populated 'location' child element
Ensure 'error-page' exists for each webapp with 'exception-type' of 'java.lang.Throwable'

Ensure allowTrace is not set to true for all webapps
Webapps 'web.xml' does not contain a 'web-app' root element.
Ensure Sever Header is Modified To Prevent Information Disclosure
Set a nondeterministic Shutdown command value
Disable the Shutdown port
Ensure an insecure Realm is not in use
Use LockOut Realms
Ensure the 'clientAuth' attribute on the 'Connector' is set to 'true'
Ensure the 'certificateVerification' attribute on the 'Connector' is set to 'required'
Ensure SSLEnabled is set to True for Sensitive Connectors
Ensure scheme is set accurately
Ensure 'secure' is set not to 'false' for Connectors where 'SSLEnabled' is set to 'true'
Ensure 'secure' is not set to 'true' for Connectors where 'SSLEnabled' is set to 'false'
